name: Runes (itch) (Seth Konoza)
description:
As the newest viking warrior in your clan, you must be tested by the druidic priests in the Ritual of Passage. If you can survive the elements of Yggdrasil's Temple, you will have a place in Valhalla.

I created this game during the 2016 Global Game Jam. I am putting it up here with a couple of my other games to see from the community which game I should develop more.
